solution_line_template: In total, the {croutons_count} croutons have {calories_per_crouton} calories/crouton * {croutons_count} croutons = <<{calories_per_crouton}*{croutons_count}={croutons_total_calories}>>{croutons_total_calories} calories.

Together, the croutons, lettuce and cucumber have {croutons_total_calories} + {lettuce_calories} + {cucumber_calories} = <<{croutons_total_calories}+{lettuce_calories}+{cucumber_calories}={total_calories}>>{total_calories} calories
